tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE livestock_breeding (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_id INT NOT NULL,
  parent1_id INT,
  parent2_id INT,
  birth_date DATE,
  breeding_date DATE,
  breeding_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LivestockBreedingInformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_name VARCHAR(50),
    parent1_id INT,
    parent2_id INT,
    birth_date DATE,
    breeding_history JSON
);

CREATE TABLE BreedingPrograms (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    program_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE parent_animal (
  animal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_name VARCHAR(255),
  birth_date DATE,
  breed VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  sire_id INT,
  dam_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE breeding_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_id INT,
  breeding_date DATE,
  breeding_type VARCHAR(50),
  result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE parent_animal (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    breed VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT
);

CREATE TABLE offspring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_id INT NOT NULL,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    breed VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parent_animal(id)
);

CREATE TABLE breeding_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_id INT NOT NULL,
    offspring_id INT NOT NULL,
    mating_date DATE NOT NULL,
    breeding_success BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parent_animal(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (offspring_id) REFERENCES offspring(id)
);

CREATE TABLE breeding_program (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE parent_animal (
    parent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_name VARCHAR(50),
    birth_date DATE,
    breed VARCHAR(50),
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female'),
    breed_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE offspring_animal (
    offspring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_id INT,
    offspring_name VARCHAR(50),
    birth_date DATE,
    breed VARCHAR(50),
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female'),
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parent_animal(parent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE breeding_stock (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT,
    breeding_date DATE,
    breeding_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (animal_id) REFERENCES offspring_animal(offspring_id)
);

CREATE TABLE breeding_program (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    program_start_date DATE,
    program_end_date DATE,
    program_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE program_participation (
    participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_id INT,
    stock_id INT,
    participation_date DATE,
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES breeding_program(program_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (stock_id) REFERENCES breeding_stock(stock_id)
);
